apiKey.label: Omi API Key
apiKey.help: Your Omi Developer API key from https://api.omi.me

baseUrl.label: Base URL
baseUrl.help: Omi API base URL (leave default unless using custom instance)

cacheTtlMs.label: Cache TTL (ms)
cacheTtlMs.help: Time-to-live for cached API responses (default: 5 minutes)

autoInject.label: Auto-Inject Memories
autoInject.help: Automatically inject recent memories and conversations into agent context on session start
